name: RestRoomCrisis
description:
You are in the bathroom without toilet paper!

Luckily, there is a claw machine next to you. Try to get enough toilet paper to clean yourself!

 

Instruction:

Use arrows to move your player and try to match 3 toilet paper that is the same color.

The poop icon indicates your score target, and the toilet paper icon under it is your current score.

There are 3 levels, the difficulties will increase.
